pages.text: "Nolite Ignem" - Do Not Burn. This ritual continuously extinguishes all fires within its range, protecting your builds from accidental (or intentional) destruction by flame.

pages.title: Costs
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 5,000 LP$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() 10 LP per fire extinguished$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 64 blocks (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Interval:$() Every second

pages.title: Coverage
pages.text: $(bold)Fire Types:$() Extinguishes both regular fire and soul fire.$(br2)$(bold)Spherical Range:$() The ritual checks all blocks within a sphere, not a cube.$(br2)$(bold)Partial Payment:$() If LP runs low, the ritual will extinguish as many fires as it can afford.$(br2)$(italic)The flames bow to blood's command.$()
